"The Power of Now" by Eckhart Tolle - This song would remind you to stay present and focus on the current moment, rather than dwelling on the past or worrying about the future.
"I Will Survive" by Gloria Gaynor - This song would remind you to persevere through difficult times and never give up.
"Eye of the Tiger" by Survivor - This song would motivate you to keep pushing forward and never give up on your goals.
"Roar" by Katy Perry - This song would remind you to be confident and empowered, and to let your voice be heard.
"Hallelujah" by Leonard Cohen - This song would remind you to find joy in the simple things and to appreciate the beauty of life.
